citation.title: to be published

notes.text: Dr. Mendelev describes this potential as "an improved version of 2009--Mendelev-M-I-Kramer-M-J-Ott-R-T-et-al--Cu-Zr. It was designed to fix the problem with artificially stable Laves phases. The potential should be used to study the verification and glass properties."
This file was provided by Mikhail Mendelev (Ames Laboratory) on 8 October 2019.
